casebody.data:
No. 09-746. Beverly Enterprises-Illinois, Inc., dba VIP Manor, Petitioner v. Virginia Mitchell, Executor of the Estate of Charles A. Mitchell, Deceased. 559 U.S. 972, 130 S. Ct. 1698,

176 L. Ed. 2d 182,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2108. March 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the Appellate Court of Illinois, First District, denied.

Same case below, 385 Ill. App. 3d 1151, 361 Ill. Dec. 138, 970 N.E.2d 138.
